title: Thediyae Thediyae Lyrics - Va Quarter Cutting Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer : Andrea Jeremiah
Song  : Thediyae Thediyae
Movie: Va Quarter Cutting
Lyrics : Kumararaja, Shiva

[
[Thediyae Thediyae kangal oikindradhe
Ambuli pola nam vetkai theikindradhe
Algebra algorithym polave irunda en vaanil
Minnal minnum nerathai] (2)

Thediyae Thediyae kangal oikindradhe
Ambuli pola nam vetkai theikindradhe
Algebra algorithym polave irunda en vaanil
Minnal minnum nerathai

Engo en life-um odum-mmm
Seashawvil aadum-mmm pillai pole
Melvandhum kele pogum-mm
Vandhum varamal pogum-mmm
Erellam thummal pole thedum
En luck-um ematriya pogum] (2)

[
[Thedinen Thedinen kannil therikindradhe
Ambuli pola nam vetkai vazharkindradhe
Paatiyin kambali polave aganda en vazhvil
Vinmeengal kankottum]   (2)

Oh...
Engum sandhosam pongum
oonjalil pillai polaadidum
Pinvandhum munne pogum
Kannal kandale podhum
Kottavi pole ottikollum
En aanadham thotri kollum] (2)
